summary: Dagger that disintegrates foes if you kill them with a sneak attack. Requested by Pyros627 on Reddit.
descriptionHtml:
Pyros627 requested a dagger that disintegrates foes when you kill them with a sneak attack. I obliged. I even threw in a custom effectshader.

That\'s it.

The dagger will automatically appear in your inventory when you install the mod.

Version 1.10 makes the dagger only disintegrate if the hit would have killed the foe anyway. If you prefer the insta-kill version, stick with 1.0.

History
1.10, 2013/06/12 - Dagger is no longer instakill, added sound effect to disintegration.
1.00, 2013/06/10 - Initial and likely only release

Contact
=======
verteiron@gmail.com

Credits
=======
Requested by Pyros627 here: http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/1g0lnu/request_a_dagger_that_disintegrates_enemies_on/

Tools Used
==========
Creation Kit
the gimp

Licensing/Legal
===============
I don\'t care what you do with this, just don\'t claim it as your own. Seriously, why would you do that?
author: Verteiron

files.name: DaggerOfDisintegration110
files.changelogHtml:
Dagger is no longer an instant-kill item, but instead will only disintegrate a foe if the blow would have killed them anyway.
Added a dust sound effect to the end of the disintegration.
